synopsis.text:
Gaining awareness of magic a decade ago has drastically reshaped the world, yet Touta, a small-town boy, remains untouched by these changes. His simple life, filled with a magical teacher and close friends, takes a sudden turn when his mentor, Yukihime, unveils herself as a vampire. After saving him from a fatal injury, Touta finds himself transformed into an immortal being.

With a newfound thirst for exploration, Touta sets out to conquer Amanomihashira, a tower leading to the cosmos. Along his journey, he stumbles upon a clandestine society of immortals known as 'UQ Holders.' As he joins their ranks, Touta gains new companions and guidance, propelling him into an extraordinary magical adventure.

Unbeknownst to many, Yukihime is the formidable Evangeline Athanasia Kitty McDowell, a legendary vampire and sorceress. As the founder and leader of UQ Holder, she takes Touta under her wing to nurture and protect him. Now, it's up to Touta to grow stronger and uncover his true potential in this world of magic and immortality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
